title: Predicting Forecast Error for the HRRR Using LSTM Neural Networks: A Comparative Study Using New York and Oklahoma State Mesonets
summary: Long Short-Term Memory (LSTM) models are trained to predict forecast error for the High-Resolution Rapid Refresh (HRRR) model using the New York State Mesonet and Oklahoma State Mesonet near-surface weather observations as ground truth. Physical and dynamical mechanisms tied to LSTM performance are evaluated by comparing the New York domain to the Oklahoma domain.
